testcase.name: Demo1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on "qa-chase.com".............................................passed And user is logged in as "test@gmail.com" "test1Pass".......................passed When user clicks on the transaction.........................................passed Then user should see all transactions.......................................passed

testcase.name: Transfer funds from USD to EUR account
testcase.system-out: Given a bank account with account number "A-12345" and balance "$1000" in USD.passed And a bank account with account number "B-67890" and balance "€800" in EUR..passed When I transfer $300 from account "A-12345" to account "B-67890" in EUR.....passed Then the account balance for account "A-12345" should be "$600".............passed And the account balance for account "B-67890" should be "€1000".............passed

testcase.name: Transfer funds from EUR to GBP account
testcase.system-out: Given a bank account with account number "B-67890" and balance "€800" in EUR.passed And a bank account with account number "C-24680" and balance "£500" in GBP..passed When I transfer €200 from account "B-67890" to account "C-24680" in GBP.....passed Then the account balance for account "B-67890" should be "€600".............passed And the account balance for account "C-24680" should be "£700"..............passed

testcase.name: Transfer funds from GBP to USD account
testcase.system-out: Given a bank account with account number "C-24680" and balance "£500" in GBP.passed And a bank account with account number "A-12345" and balance "$1000" in USD.passed When I transfer £100 from account "C-24680" to account "A-12345" in USD.....passed Then the account balance for account "C-24680" should be "£400".............passed And the account balance for account "A-12345" should be "$700"..............passed
